info.name: crayon for mal
info.description: Comes in various parts! An extra is barely needed for Firefox. Customises and refines all aspects of the site. Optimised for symmetricality, friendly appearance and ease of use. Easily changeable background by installing another style. PS. All ads and social media elements are removed ‎(ヽ`д´)┌┛★)`з゜) * This theme will put stats back on top for myanimelist profiles.
info.additionalInfo: crayon for mal (myanimelist / myanimelist.net) by sunnysummerday -- FIREFOX (bug fixes for Firefox) | https://userstyles.org/styles/86438/ CUSTOM (change bg/edit stuff) | https://userstyles.org/styles/131907/ MODERN (bonus for anime pages) | https://userstyles.org/styles/163185/ -- DETAILS: https://myanimelist.net/forum/?topicid=584935 (for help) CREDITS: main bar base (Modernized), a few other ideas (re[MAL])
